name: FetchBoardContentChanges
description:
Fetches content changes for board items in your organization.

Use this tool to retrieve content changes made to board items in your organization, including updates, creations, and deletions by users. You can filter the results by time period, board IDs, and user emails, and paginate the data for processing. Note: This tool is for Enterprise plan users and requires Company Admin role.

parameters.name: start_date_time
parameters.description: Specify the start date and time for filtering content logs, in UTC format (ISO 8601 with trailing Z).

value_schema.description:
Filter content logs based on the date and time when the board item was last modified. This is the start date and time for the modified date duration.
Format: UTC, adheres to [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601), includes a [trailing Z offset](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Coordinated_Universal_Time_(UTC)).

parameters.name: end_modification_datetime
parameters.description: Specify the end date and time for filtering content logs based on when a board item was last modified. Use UTC format adhering to ISO 8601 with a trailing Z offset.

value_schema.description:
Filter content logs based on the date and time when the board item was last modified. This is the end date and time for the modified date duration. Format: UTC, adheres to
[ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601), includes a [trailing Z offset](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Coordinated_Universal_Time_(UTC)).

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: A string representing the unique identifier of the organization required for fetching board content changes.

parameters.name: board_ids
parameters.description: List of board IDs for retrieving content logs. Provide as an array of strings.

value_schema.description: List of board IDs for which you want to retrieve the content logs.

parameters.name: user_email_filter
parameters.description: Filter content logs based on the list of emails of users who created, modified, or deleted board items.

value_schema.description: Filter content logs based on the list of emails of users who created, modified, or deleted the board item.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination to fetch the next set of results. Use the cursor value from the previous response to continue retrieving paginated results.

value_schema.description: A cursor-paginated method returns a portion of the total set of results based on the limit specified and a cursor that points to the next portion of the results. To retrieve the next portion of the collection, set the cursor parameter equal to the cursor value you received in the response of the previous request.

parameters.name: max_results_per_call
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return per call. If exceeded, a cursor is provided for pagination.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to return per call. If the number of logs in the response is greater than the limit specified, the response returns the cursor parameter with a value.

parameters.name: sort_order_by_date
parameters.description: Specify 'asc' for ascending or 'desc' for descending sort order based on modified date.

value_schema.description: Sort order in which you want to view the result set based on the modified date. To sort by an ascending modified date, specify `asc`. To sort by a descending modified date, specify `desc`.
